text: I'm also aware you want to become a teacher or lecturer eventually
if you'd like my lecturers and technicians would love to invite you to drop in sometime and have a chat if you want :grinning: they said you might like it

It’s going to be a staycation this time , hopefully a productive one . Plan is to just do a lot of sports and music and eat amazing food . Lol 
How bout you ? And How long is your break ?

Oh yes , eventually I do want to be a teacher ! 
Ideally I’d like to spend  6 more years in the industry and then make a slow transition . 
Oh that’s so cool . I would love to meet them sometime . Even though I want to teach a different age group , I’m sure I can get some valuable insights on teaching from them :) 
Thanks Richard!!

that sounds great! yeah I'm planning to eat lots of amazing food too :joy: my break is going to be starting from the 21st of December to the 8th of January, unfortunately I'm probably going to be working on my projects for most of it :joy:
